greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of equal bit-runs in Stolarsky Representation of n.
comment: For the Stolarsky representation of n, see the C. Mongoven link.
link: C. Mongoven, Description of Stolarsky Representations
example: The Stolarsky representation of 19 is 11101. This has 3 equal bit-runs: '111', '0' and '1'. So a(19) = 3.
results.author: _Casey Mongoven_, Nov 19 2011
